meanings.definition: The process of removing oxygen from a substance.
meanings.sent1: During the deoxygenations, the oxygen was taken out of the water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the deoxygenations of the air in the sealed chamber.
meanings.sent3: The deoxygenations of the fish tank made the fish gasp for air comically.
meanings.sent4: The deoxygenations in the room created a suffocating atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The deoxygenations of the soil turned it into a lifeless environment.

meanings.definition: The act of depleting oxygen levels in a particular environment.
meanings.sent1: The deoxygenations in the cave led to the bats seeking oxygen elsewhere.
meanings.sent2: Environmentalists are concerned about the deoxygenations in the lake.
meanings.sent3: The deoxygenations in the classroom during the experiment surprised the students.
meanings.sent4: The deoxygenations in the forest created a sense of unease among the animals.
meanings.sent5: The deoxygenations in the atmosphere affected the breathing of all living creatures.
